i18n: Hi everyone , welcome to our reading time
s: 大家好，欢迎来到我们的阅读时间

i18n: This is marina
s: 这就是码头

i18n: Today we are going to read the little princ
s: 今天我们要读一读小原则

i18n: Chapter ONE
s: 第一章

i18n: Once when i was six years old
s: 一次是在我六岁的时候

i18n: I saw a magnificent picture in a boo
s: 我在一片嘘声中看到了一张宏伟的画面

i18n: Called true stories from natur
s: 来自 natur 的真实故事

i18n: About the prime evil forest
s: 关于原初邪恶森林

i18n: It was a picture of a boa constricto
s: 那是一条蟒蛇的照片

i18n: In the act of swallowing an animal
s: 吞食动物的行为

i18n: Here IS A COPY OF THE DRAWING
s: 这是图纸的副本

i18n: In the boo
s: 在嘘声中

i18n: It said : boa constrictors swallow their prey whol
s: 它说：蟒蛇吞下他们的猎物 whol

i18n: Without chewing it
s: 无需咀嚼

i18n: After that they are not able to move
s: 之后他们就不能移动了

i18n: And they sleep through the six months that they need for digestion
s: 他们睡过消化所需的六个月

i18n: I pondered deepl
s: 我沉思着

i18n: Then over the adventures of the jungle
s: 然后穿越丛林的冒险

i18n: And after some work with a colored pencil
s: 在用彩色铅笔工作一番之后

i18n: I SUCCEEDED IN MAKING MY FIRST DRAWING
s: 我成功地画了我的第一幅画

i18n: My join number one
s: 我的第一名

i18n: It looked like this
s: 它看起来像这样

i18n: I showed my masterpiece to the grown ups
s: 我向大人们展示了我的杰作

i18n: And asked them whether the drawing frightened them
s: 并问他们这幅画是否吓到了他们

i18n: But they answered frightened
s: 但他们害怕地回答

i18n: Why SHOULD ANYONE BE FRIGHTENED BY A HAT
s: 为什么有人应该被帽子吓到

i18n: My drawing was not a picture of a hat
s: 我的画不是一顶帽子的图片

i18n: It WAS A PICTURE OF A BOA CONSTRICTOR DIGESTING AN ELEPHANT
s: 那是一张蟒蛇消化大象的照片

i18n: But since the grown ups were not able to understand it
s: 但是由于大人们无法理解它

i18n: I made another drawing
s: 我又画了一幅画

i18n: I DREW THE INSIDE OF THE BOA CONSTRUCTOR
s: 我画了 BOA 构造器的内部

i18n: So that the grown ups could see it clearly
s: 这样大人们才能看得清楚

i18n: They always need to have things explained
s: 他们总是需要解释事情

i18n: My drawing number two looked like this
s: 我的第二幅画是这样的

i18n: The grown ups response this time was to advise m
s: 这次大人们的反应是劝我

i18n: To lay aside my drawings of boa constrictors
s: 放下我对蟒蛇的画作

i18n: Whether from the inside or the outside
s: 无论是从内部还是从外部

i18n: And devote myself instead to geography
s: 转而致力于地理

i18n: History , arithmetic and grammar
s: 历史、算术和语法

i18n: That is why at the age of six
s: 这就是为什么在六岁时

i18n: I give up what might have been a magnificent career as a painter
s: 我放弃了本来可能辉煌的画家生涯

i18n: I had been disheartened by the failure of my join number on
s: 我对我的加入号码失败感到沮丧

i18n: And my join number two
s: 我的第二个加入

i18n: Grown ups never understand anything by themselves
s: 大人自己永远无法理解任何事情

i18n: And it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them
s: 孩子们总是永远向他们解释事情是令人厌烦的

i18n: So then i chose another professio
s: 所以后来我选择了另一个专业

i18n: And learn to pilot airplants
s: 并学习驾驶 airplant

i18n: I have flown a little over all parts of the world
s: 我飞遍了世界各地

i18n: And it is true that geography has been very useful to m
s: 确实，地理对 m 非常有用

i18n: At a glance
s: 一目了然

i18n: I can distinguish china from arizon
s: 我可以区分中国和亚利松

i18n: If one gets lost in the night
s: 如果一个人在黑夜迷路

i18n: Such knowledge is valuable
s: 这些知识很有价值

i18n: In THE COURSE OF THIS LIFE
s: 在今生的过程中

i18n: I have had a great many encounter
s: 我遇到过很多次

i18n: With A GREAT MANY PEOPLE
s: 与很多人在一起

i18n: Who have been concerned with matters of consequence
s: 谁曾关心过重要的事情

i18n: I have lived a great deal among grown ups
s: 我在成年人中生活了很多

i18n: I have seen them immediately close at hand
s: 我看到他们近在咫尺

i18n: And that hasn't much improved by piling of them
s: 而这种情况并没有因为堆积而得到太大改善

i18n: Whenever i met one of them
s: 每当我遇到他们中的一个

i18n: Who seemed to me at all clear sided
s: 在我看来，谁是完全清楚的

i18n: I tried the experiment of showing him my join number one
s: 我尝试了向他展示我的 1 号加入的实验

i18n: Which i have always kept
s: 我一直保持着

i18n: I would try to find out
s: 我会试着找出答案

i18n: So if this was a person of true understanding
s: 所以，如果这是一个真正有理解力的人

i18n: But whoever it was
s: 但不管是谁

i18n: He or she would always say
s: 他或她总是会说

i18n: That is a hat
s: 那是一顶帽子

i18n: Then i would never talk to that person about boa constrictors
s: 那我就永远不会和那个人谈论蟒蛇

i18n: Or prime evil forests or stars
s: 或者为邪恶森林或星星

i18n: I would bring myself down to his level
s: 我会把自己降低到他的水平

i18n: I would talk to him about bridge and golf , and politics and neckties
s: 我会和他谈论桥牌和高尔夫，以及政治和领带

i18n: And the growing up would be greatly pleased to have met such a sensible man
s: 长大后会很高兴遇到这样一个明智的人

i18n: Thank you for listenin
s: 感谢您的收听

i18n: Next time we are going to read the chapter two
s: 下次我们要读第二章

i18n: See YOU NEXT TIME BYE BYE
s: 下次再见 再见
